page.title: 18Entertainment in Cornwood
page.content: For a small country village Cornwood provides plenty of opportunities for people to meet each other socially. Apart from the church,which now caters for social gatherings,there is a Mother & Baby club;Playgroup;Youth club;Brownies;Cub Scouts;Friendship club(over 6O's);W.I.;Cricket club; Br. Legion group and a Local History group.The village has a public hall in which the above groups organise fairs; jumble-sales;bingo and whist-drives. The local Cancer Fund Committee has this year raised Â£75O, and the Heart Machines Equipment Committee,at a recent coffee-morning,raised Â£1O5. This year's Flower Festival,in the church,raised Â£87O towards the upkeep of the church. Each Augest,Cornwood holds a 'Show' consisting of gymkhana events,animal & produce showing,side- shows and exhibitions.
